name: Modern Design Agency
tagline: Build Your Brand, Drive Traffic, Drive Success
description:
Modern Design Agency is Rapid City, SD's leading marketing agency, specializing in custom web design, web development, and search engine optimization. 
We live in a creative world, but we aren't your ordinary creative. We bring big city digital marketing solutions to the heart of the Midwest. Deviating from the norm, everything we design and develop is completely custom, and every campaign we implement makes our clients much more money than it will ever make us.
